languages.text: {n}Истекающий кровью Маражай, шатаясь, поднимается на ноги. В его глазах плещется сознание — и страх.{/n} "Они... мертвы? Исчезли, растворились... Но я слышу их шепоты. Как мон-кай могут выносить эти шепоты днями и неделями?" {n}В его голосе сквозит искреннее непонимание.{/n}

{n}Marazhai staggers to his feet, bleeding from his many wounds. There is awareness in his eyes — and fear.{/n} "They're... dead? Gone, vanished... But I can still hear their whispers. How do mon-keigh bear them for days and days on end?" {n}You hear genuine confusion in his voice.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Истекающий кровью Маражай, шатаясь, поднимается на ноги. В его глазах плещется сознание — и страх.{/n} "Они... мертвы? Исчезли, растворились... Но я слышу их шепоты. Как мон-кай могут выносить эти шепоты днями и неделями?" {n}В его голосе сквозит искреннее непонимание.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai tombe à genoux, saignant profusément. Vous décelez dans ses yeux une forme de conscience... et de peur.{/n} « Ils sont... morts ? Partis, volatilisés... Mais j'entends toujours leurs murmures. Comment les mon-keigh parviennent-ils à les supporter des jours durant ? » {n}Vous relevez une confusion sincère dans le ton de sa voix.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai staggers to his feet, bleeding from his many wounds. There is awareness in his eyes — and fear.{/n} "They're... dead? Gone, vanished... But I can still hear their whispers. How do mon-keigh bear them for days and days on end?" {n}You hear genuine confusion in his voice.{/n}

Mais j'entends toujours leurs murmures. Comment les mon-keigh parviennent-ils à les supporter des jours durant ? » {n}Vous relevez une confusion sincère dans le ton de sa voix.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは多くの傷から血を流しながらも、よろよろと立ち上がる。その目にはしっかりと意識が宿っており…また、恐怖も見て取れた。{/n}「あいつら…死んだのか？いなくなった、消えちまった…だが、今でも奴らの囁き声が聞こえる。モン＝ケイはどうやって何日も耐え続けているんだ？」{n}彼の声には戸惑いが混ざっていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai staggers to his feet, bleeding from his many wounds. There is awareness in his eyes — and fear.{/n} "They're... dead? Gone, vanished... But I can still hear their whispers. How do mon-keigh bear them for days and days on end?" {n}You hear genuine confusion in his voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは多くの傷から血を流しながらも、よろよろと立ち上がる。その目にはしっかりと意識が宿っており…また、恐怖も見て取れた。{/n}「あいつら…死んだのか？いなくなった、消えちまった…だが、今でも奴らの囁き声が聞こえる。モン＝ケイはどうやって何日も耐え続けているんだ？」{n}彼の声には戸惑いが混ざっていた。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋摇摇晃晃地站了起来，身上无数伤口都在流血。他的目光中满是警觉——还有恐惧。{/n}“他们……都死了吗？消失了，不在了……可我依然能听到他们的低语。猴子究竟是如何日复一日忍受这一切的？”{n}他的声音中带着真诚的困惑。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai staggers to his feet, bleeding from his many wounds. There is awareness in his eyes — and fear.{/n} "They're... dead? Gone, vanished... But I can still hear their whispers. How do mon-keigh bear them for days and days on end?" {n}You hear genuine confusion in his voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋摇摇晃晃地站了起来，身上无数伤口都在流血。他的目光中满是警觉——还有恐惧。{/n}“他们……都死了吗？消失了，不在了……可我依然能听到他们的低语。猴子究竟是如何日复一日忍受这一切的？”{n}他的声音中带着真诚的困惑。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Marazhai erhebt sich schwerfällig, aus seinen vielen Wunden blutend. Es liegt Erkenntnis in seinem Blick — und Angst.{/n} "Sie sind ... tot? Fort, verschwunden ... Doch ich kann ihr Flüstern noch immer hören. Wie ertragen Chem-Pan-Sey das Tag für Tag für Tag?" {n}Du hörst aufrichtige Verwunderung in seiner Stimme.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai staggers to his feet, bleeding from his many wounds. There is awareness in his eyes — and fear.{/n} "They're... dead? Gone, vanished... But I can still hear their whispers. How do mon-keigh bear them for days and days on end?" {n}You hear genuine confusion in his voice.{/n}

Doch ich kann ihr Flüstern noch immer hören. Wie ertragen Chem-Pan-Sey das Tag für Tag für Tag?" {n}Du hörst aufrichtige Verwunderung in seiner Stimme.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai se pone en pie, tambaleándose y sangrando profusamente por sus numerosas heridas. Distingues lucidez en su mirada; y también miedo.{/n} «¿Están... muertos? Desaparecidos, desterrados... pero aún oigo sus susurros. ¿Cómo pueden los mon-keigh soportarlos durante días y días?». {n}Percibes una genuina confusión en su voz.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai staggers to his feet, bleeding from his many wounds. There is awareness in his eyes — and fear.{/n} "They're... dead? Gone, vanished... But I can still hear their whispers. How do mon-keigh bear them for days and days on end?" {n}You hear genuine confusion in his voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai se pone en pie, tambaleándose y sangrando profusamente por sus numerosas heridas. Distingues lucidez en su mirada; y también miedo.{/n} «¿Están... muertos? Desaparecidos, desterrados... pero aún oigo sus susurros. ¿Cómo pueden los mon-keigh soportarlos durante días y días?». {n}Percibes una genuina confusión en su voz.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Aldığı birçok yaradan kan akan Marazhai sendeliyor. Gözlerinde farkındalık ve... Korku var.{/n} "Öldüler mi? Gittiler. Yok oldular... Gerçi hâlâ fısıltılarını duyabiliyorum. Mon-keighler bunlara günbegün nasıl katlanıyor?" {n}Sesindeki samimi şaşkınlığı hissedebiliyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai staggers to his feet, bleeding from his many wounds. There is awareness in his eyes — and fear.{/n} "They're... dead? Gone, vanished... But I can still hear their whispers. How do mon-keigh bear them for days and days on end?" {n}You hear genuine confusion in his voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Aldığı birçok yaradan kan akan Marazhai sendeliyor. Gözlerinde farkındalık ve... Korku var.{/n} "Öldüler mi? Gittiler. Yok oldular. Hâlâ fısıltılarını duyabiliyorum ama. Mon-keighler bunlara günbegün nasıl katlanabiliyorlar?" {n}Sesindeki samimi kafa karışıklığını hissedebiliyorsun.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC
